description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Orchard, Singapore. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: World-Renowned Five-Star Shangri-La Singapore Luxury near Iconic Orchard Road
hotels.description: Experience one of Singapore's Best of the Best hotels for 2021 with a stay at the world-renowned, five-star Shangri-La Singapore, ranked within the top 1% of the world on Tripadvisor. Hidden smack bang in a high-class residential estate on the fringes of Orchard Road, this city oasis feels remote and yet very central. Consider this Shangri-La escape your literal urban oasis within the heart of the city, where you can succumb to tropical bliss amid 15 acres of lush, manicured gardens with a cascading waterfall and orchard greenhouse sculpture at its centre.

seo.title: Hoteles en Orchard - Singapore Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Orchard, Singapore con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
